dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3013634L] Copyright report
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 09, 2007 9:14 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3013634L] Copyright report

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Copyright report
Added by system at Friday, Feb 9 2007 02:44 pm

rPWN2UUVM1lx6p6wJEZdj8DqtqmXHUjK8UdlY_PIDBSjMDlIxoy1M4Q.iRBjLW2ZuDdgk.0d
GT_d_g923rqNxNDVkW0pXBJzuXsr_tjXpV5MzDMgk7OgnU9BV9C4mx.JpjwuEfvHs47A

Subject: Copyright report

FILETIME=[1953DCC0:01C74C8B] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Hello, 
 
I am John Brunton, one of the owner of www.caws.ws 
 
It has been brought to my attention one of your customers has taken  
content from my site, protected by copyright without permission or
credit. 
 
Basically every single "creation" on their pages is copied from ours,  
but here is some of them: 
 
Copied: http://www.svr06.com/SVR07/CAWs/Vampire%20(PS2).htm 
Original: http://caws.ws/svr2007/show.php?cat=caws&s=vampire 
That one is actually made by one of the owners of our site, exclusively

for our site. 
 
Copied:  
http://www.svr06.com/SVR06/Current_WWE_Roster/B/Boogeymen/Boogeyman%201.
htm 
Original: http://caws.ws/svr2006/showcaw.php?s=boogeyman8 
 
Copied:  
http://www.svr06.com/SVR06/TNA_Roster/J/James%20Mitchell/James%20Mitchel
l%201.htm 
Original: http://caws.ws/svr2006/showcaw.php?s=james_mitchell 
 
Copied:  
http://www.svr06.com/SVR06/TNA_Roster/J/Jeff%20Jarrett/Jeff%20Jarrett%20
3.htm 
Original: http://caws.ws/svr2006/showcaw.php?s=jeff_jarrett 
 
Copied:  
http://www.svr06.com/SVR06/TNA_Roster/J/Jeff%20Jarrett/Jeff%20Jarrett%20
4.htm 
Original: http://caws.ws/svr2006/showcaw.php?s=jeff_jarrett 
 
Copied:  
http://www.svr06.com/SVR06/Old_WWE_WWF_Roster/N/Nikolai%20Volkoff/Nikola
i%20Volkoff%201.htm 
Original: http://caws.ws/svr2006/showcaw.php?s=nicolai_volkoff2 
 
As I said, every single one on there is copied, too many to reference  
here. If you go to http://caws.ws/svr2007/menu.php?cat=caws you can find

all the originals and then go to  
http://www.svr06.com/SVR07/CAWs/index.htm and find the fakes. 
 
 
Regards, 
 
John Brunton 
CAWs.ws
